statements: SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords;
SELECT sculpture_id, restoration_date FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT record_id, conservator_name FROM SculptureRestorationRecords ORDER BY restoration_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, treatment_description FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_type = 'Repair' ORDER BY sculpture_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, restoration_date, conservator_name FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_type = 'Cleaning' ORDER BY restoration_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, MAX(restoration_date) AS last_restoration_date FROM SculptureRestorationRecords GROUP BY sculpture_id;
SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, restoration_type FROM SculptureRestorationRecords GROUP BY restoration_type ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords;
SELECT sculpture_id, restoration_date, conservator_name FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ConservationRecords ORDER BY conservation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_id, conservator_name, condition_report FROM ConservationRecords WHERE sculpture_id = 10;
SELECT id, restoration_date, description FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE conservator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE sculpture_id = 1;
SELECT sculpture_id, restoration_date, conservator_name FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE restoration_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, conservator_name, description FROM SculptureRestorationRecords WHERE description LIKE '%crack%';
SELECT * FROM ConservationRecords WHERE conservation_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_id, conservator_name, condition_report FROM ConservationRecords WHERE conservator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM SculptureRecords;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM SculptureRecords;
SELECT * FROM ConservationHistory WHERE restoration_type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT conservator_name, conservation_date FROM ConservationHistory WHERE restoration_type = 'Repair';
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, restoration_date FROM SculptureRecords WHERE restoration_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM SculptureRecords WHERE restoration_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ConservationHistory ORDER BY conservation_date DESC;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, restoration_type FROM SculptureRecords LEFT JOIN ConservationHistory ON SculptureRecords.record_id = ConservationHistory.record_id;
SELECT DISTINCT artist_name FROM SculptureRecords WHERE sculpture_name LIKE '%bronze%';

SELECT sculpture_name, conservation_date, restoration_step FROM SculptureRecords INNER JOIN ConservationHistory ON SculptureRecords.record_id = ConservationHistory.record_id INNER JOIN RestorationLogs ON ConservationHistory.conservation_id = RestorationLogs.conservation_id ORDER BY conservation_date, log_entry_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sculpture_tbl;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculpture_tbl WHERE material_used = 'Marble';
SELECT artist_name, year_created FROM Sculpture_tbl ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM Restoration_Record_tbl WHERE restoration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sculpture_name, inspection_notes FROM Sculpture_tbl JOIN Inspection_Record_tbl ON Sculpture_tbl.id = Inspection_Record_tbl.sculpture_id;
SELECT * FROM Sculpture_tbl WHERE year_created > 2000
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculpture_tbl ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC
SELECT sculpture_name, material_used FROM Sculpture_tbl WHERE material_used = 'Marble' AND year_created BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000
SELECT * FROM Restoration_Record_tbl JOIN Sculpture_tbl ON Sculpture_tbl.id = Restoration_Record_tbl.sculpture_id
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, inspection_date, inspection_notes FROM Sculpture_tbl JOIN Inspection_Record_tbl ON Sculpture_tbl.id = Inspection_Record_tbl.sculpture_id
SELECT * FROM Sculptures;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name FROM Sculptures WHERE creation_year > 2000;
SELECT sculpture_name, current_location FROM Sculptures ORDER BY sculpture_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RestorationLogs WHERE restoration_type = 'Cleaning';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM RestorationTeam WHERE team_size >= 5;
SELECT sculpture_name, artist_name, creation_year FROM Sculptures ORDER BY creation_year DESC, artist_name ASC
SELECT sculpture_name, current_location FROM Sculptures WHERE current_location = 'Museum of Modern Art'
SELECT t.team_name, t.team_lead, COUNT(r.sculpture_id) AS total_restorations FROM RestorationTeam t LEFT JOIN RestorationLogs r ON t.team_id = r.team_id GROUP BY t.team_name, t.team_lead

SELECT c.material_name, c.material_type, s.sculpture_name FROM ConservationMaterials c JOIN ConservationRecord r ON c.material_id = r.material_id JOIN Sculptures s ON r.sculpture_id = s.id WHERE r.condition_report LIKE '%damaged%'

SELECT r.restoration_date, r.restoration_type, s.sculpture_name, t.team_name FROM RestorationLogs r JOIN Sculptures s ON r.sculpture_id = s.id JOIN RestorationTeam t ON r.team_id = t.team_id ORDER BY r.restoration_date DESC,s.sculpture_name
